we make renting simple for everyone

For Landlords

Stayrs makes it easy to collect rent, advertise and manage your properties or tenants and so much more!

For Tenants

We provide the perfect way to make rent payments, request maintanence and communicate with your fellow tenants, landlord or property manager!

For Everyone!

Our goal is to make renting and property investment simple for everyone, no matter who you are. Our goal is to change the way we rent.
